text: Please advice the tall girl wearing scarf to properly do her work cause everytime i buy from there, she is rude, customer service very bad, keep mumbling and not doing her work properly. Been there a few times and she is always pushing her job to others as i can see. Will report this to your hq if this girl still doesnt change her work attitude. Very bad.

Did a ordered today but the tall girl was so busy playing phone beside the cashier , thank you to the another short girl for taking my order. Not the first time it happened last week also i have to wait for my orders bcs the tall malay staff was so busy playing phone while making drinks.

Liho junction 10, lousy CS! Worst CS ever!! Wrongly packed my order to the next customer, he came back to return my drink. Your staff (the short Chinese girl!) just repacked it into another bag, not calling my number, no apologies and display the next customer’s number on the screen. I continue to wait to see what happens. Still nothing! At the end I had to be the one to ask her if that’s my order and then when she said thats mine!! Seriously??!???!! Additionally, the previous customer had gone with the drink, just repack and gave it to me?? And that’s your standard?????

Paid $5.70 for a large cup of no. 76 Passion Roselle Smoothie with Konjac. The drink was refreshing given the hot weather. Although it was 50% sugar, it was still too sweet. Service was great as the lady at the counter waited patiently for me to choose my drink. Then she was also friendly in guiding me to redeem the Far East mall voucher.
Thanks for the fast service! There were alot of orders when I came but the staff Jerami still managed despite being alone. Kudos!
